What sets us apart.

Photonic Tek Works LLC was founded to provide the highest quality of service in all of its areas of expertise.

4

Customer interactions with Photonic Tek Works LLC will not be disclosed without prior permission from the customer.

Photonic Tek Works is committed to on-time delivery of work product, we will meet your deadlines or communicate any problems meeting deadlines upfront before the project is started.

Meet The Founder

/ NUBURU

As CEO, Dr. Zediker lead the company from startup to market entry. He secured funding, built the team, and established industry partnerships with GE Additive.

239

Granted patents

$70m

IDIQ program with Nav Sea

/ Foro Energy

Cofounder of Foro Energy, Dr. Zediker served as the CTO, overseeing the development of the first laser oil well decommissioning tool. He led technology development, achieved successful laser drilling through ultrahard rock.

239

Granted Patents

$9m

ARPA-E grant

/ Nuvonyx

Dr. Zediker, as CEO of Nuvonyx, introduced a 4kW industrial laser to the market. He oversaw the acquisition of a French company, delivered laser pump arrays (20kW to 75kW) to aerospace companies, and successfully sold Nuvonyx to Coherent and Quantel.

2

Granted Patents

$80m

IDIQ contract with the Air Force

/ McDonnell Douglas

Dr. Zediker pioneered the world's first coherently combined semiconductor laser system, overseeing the development of a 1000 active emitter coherent laser array. His innovations included the first 100W fiber laser, a 1GB/Sec coherent communication system, a micro-doppler laser radar system, and more. Dr. Zediker holds many patents, including a high-power fiber optic phased array patent.

20

Granted Patents

Dr. Mark Zediker

Dr.Zediker has extensive experience with managing companies and technology development.
